title: Wanted: Lady Baldwin Old Judge or Autograph
author: longstreet766

posts.post_title: Wanted: Lady Baldwin Old Judge or Autograph
posts.post_content:
Baldwin lived in my hometown for some time and I'm very interested in acquiring an Old Judge card or autograph. If any one is interested in parting with one, shoot me an email at [url]gray766@hotmail.com[/url].
Thanks,

Mike Gray
[url]gray766@hotmail.com[/url]
Good luck with the search.  The card is tough.  I can't imagine how tough the signature is going to be.  Seriously, if an OJ gets offered to you, take it - FAST!

So you're from the small town of Hastings, MI?  As Fred pointed out, Lady is among the tougher OJs and seems to be on several collectors want list.  Lady Baldwin was well liked by his contemporaries well after his career was cut short by arm issues.  Neat guy with an interesting nick name.  Good luck with your quest.

Yep im from Hastings, nice town and where he died in '37. I've been trying to find an OJ for a while, but no luck yet. 
Mike

You will need a lot of luck with this search. I had a Lady Baldwin, but traded it to Joe G, who posted above. It was a very generous trade by the way. Thanks Joe G:). 

Joe M.
